judges: Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bob: and Eagen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on opinion of Judge Shumaker, 20 Pa. D. & C. 2d 290. Costs on appellants.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: John L. Wilson, with him Raymond G. Miller, Deputy Attorney General, and Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Gerlach, Appellant.
Argued March. 17, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bob: and Eagen, JJ.
Lee G. McGandless, for appellants.
John L. Wilson, with him Raymond G. Miller, Deputy Attorney General, and Anne X. Alpern, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
April 18, 1960:
